T = int(raw_input())
for i in range(T):
    (N,Q)= map(int,raw_input().split())
    s = raw_input()
    for j in range(Q):
        l = raw_input().split()
        n = s.count(l[0])%2
        if(l[1]=="even" and n==0):
            print "yes"
        elif(l[1]=="odd" and n==1):
            print "yes"
        else:
            print "no"
